text: Marc Armand Ouellet (born 8 June 1944) is a Canadian prelate of the Catholic Church. He was made the prefect of the Congregation for Bishops and president of the Pontifical Commission for Latin America in 2010 by Pope Benedict XVI. He was Archbishop of Quebec and Primate of Canada from 2003 to 2010. He was made a cardinal by Pope John Paul II on 21 October 2003. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian Roman Catholic bishops Category:Cardinals of the Roman Catholic Church Category:People from Quebec
title: Marc Ouellet
